decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification, a drainage layout and a management &
maintenance plan (where applicable) of at least one suitable sustainable drainage system (i.e. water butt
with overflow, raingarden, bioretention planter box, living roof (substrate depth of 80-150mm excluding
the vegetative mat), permeable paving etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in
consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an
infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must
be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an
overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.REASON: To mitigate against the impacts of surface water flooding.

<p>All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture.&nbsp;</p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-5a6c7109-7fff-6d3e-6f93-9f53e39342d9"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: In the interests of the visual amenities of the surrounding area. </span></span></p>

<p>The following shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture.&nbsp;</p><p>a) Front Stairs shall be made from natural stone.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON:&nbsp; In order to retain the appearance and visual amenities of the conservation property.&nbsp;</p>
description: Erection of single storey lower-ground floor rear extension,  alterations to rear elevation,  new rear windows and new window to front basement and new basement steps.
